Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Literary papyrus
Description: On the close links between P. Lille 86 verso and P. Lille 85 recto, consult the entry devoted to P. Lille 85 recto.
